description: A powerful tool to create, manage, and track ad campaigns across Facebook, Instagram, Messenger, and the Audience Network.
use_cases: Increase website traffic and online sales.
Generate new leads for a business.
Promote brand awareness and reach new audiences.
Drive engagement with posts and events.

technical_aspects.targeting_options: Detailed targeting by location, demographics, interests, and behaviors. Custom audiences can be created from customer lists or website visitors using the Meta Pixel.
technical_aspects.meta_pixel: A snippet of code for your website that helps you track conversions from Meta ads, optimize campaigns, build targeted audiences, and retarget people who have already taken an action on your website.
technical_aspects.ad_formats: Supports a wide range of formats including images, videos, carousels, and collections.

pricing_model.budgeting: You set your own budget, which can be a daily or a lifetime budget. The system will aim to get you the most results for your budget.
pricing_model.roi: Return on Ad Spend (ROAS) can be tracked using the Meta Pixel to measure the revenue generated for every dollar spent on advertising.
